ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: Geohazard Tep WPS
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: Proxy WPS of the geohazard platform

wps:Process.ows:Title: ASAR PF
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The ENVISAT ASAR PF is the ESA operational Level-1 processor developed by MDA. This processor, integrated on the ESA's Grid Processing On Demand , perform on-demand production of L1 products.

wps:Process.ows:Title: InSAR SBAS
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The InSAR Small BAseline Subsets (SBAS) algorithm has been developed by IREA-CNR for monitoring temporal evolution of surface deformations and to generate interferograms stacks as well. The InSAR Parallel-SBAS (P-SBAS) algorithm version has been integrated on the ESA's Grid Processing On Demand (G-POD) to exploit the avaialble High Performance Computing resources.

wps:Process.ows:Title: GAMMA DInSAR
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The GAMMA SAR and Interferometry Software is a collection of programs, developed by GAMMA Remote Sensing, which allows processing of SAR, interferometric SAR (InSAR) and differential interferometric SAR (DInSAR) data. The GAMMA DInSAR service integrated on the ESA's Grid Processing On Demand (G-POD) performs the generation of differential interferograms starting from ENVISAT L1 SLC.

wps:Process.ows:Title: GAMMA Level-0
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The GAMMA SAR and Interferometry Software is a collection of programs, developed by GAMMA Remote Sensing, which allows processing of SAR, interferometric SAR (InSAR) and differential interferometric SAR (DInSAR) data. The GAMMA Level-0 service, integrated on the ESA's Grid Processing On Demand (G-POD), performs the image focusing of ENVISAT ASAR Level-0 products.

wps:Process.ows:Title: NEST InSAR
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The NEST InSAR service, integrated on the ESA's Grid Processing On Demand (G-POD), implements the InSAR workflow avaialble on NEST to produce simple interferograms and coherence maps starting from ASAR Level-1 SLC (IMS) products.

wps:Process.ows:Title: NEST CoReg
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The NEST CoReg service, integrated on the ESA's Grid Processing On Demand (G-POD), implements the SAR Coregistration workflow avaialble on NEST.

wps:Process.ows:Title: NEST Toolbox
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The Next ESA SAR Toolbox (NEST) is an open source toolbox for reading, processing and analysing and visualising the large archive of SAR data (from Level 1). This service, integrated on the ESA's Grid Processing On Demand (G-POD), allows users to import an exisiting processing definition and run it on the selected input products.

wps:Process.ows:Title: PF-ERS
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The ERS PF is the ESA operational Level-1 SAR processor developed by MDA. This processor, integrated on the ESA's Grid Processing On Demand (G-POD), perform on-demand production of L1 products.

wps:Process.ows:Title: SBAS S1A
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: The Small BAseline Subsets (SBAS) algorithm has been developed by IREA-CNR for monitoring temporal evolution of surface deformations and to generate interferograms stacks as well. The Parallel-SBAS (P-SBAS) algorithm version has been integrated on the ESA's Grid Processing On Demand (G-POD) to exploit the avaialble High Performance Computing resources.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Extraction and Download of EO Products
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the retrieval and publishing of ESA products. The request must specify the date and spatial range together with the dataset name

wps:Process.ows:Title: Download of EO Products - Time Based
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the retrieval and publishing of ESA products. The request must specify the date and spatial range together with the dataset name

wps:Process.ows:Title: Download of EO Products - UK-PAC
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the test of UK-PAC CE.

wps:Process.ows:Title: MERIS Mosaic COM
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the MERIS Mosaic COM G-POD service

wps:Process.ows:Title: MIRAVI Geo
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the MIRAVI service. The request must specify the date and spatial range together with the dataset name

wps:Process.ows:Title: BEAMARITHM
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the BEAMARITHM service

wps:Process.ows:Title: MGVIREGIONAL
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the MGVIREGIONAL service

wps:Process.ows:Title: EnviProjAntarctic
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the EnviProjAntarctic service

wps:Process.ows:Title: fAPAR
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the SSE-Grid fAPAR

wps:Process.ows:Title: GPODTEST
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the GPODTEST service

wps:Process.ows:Title: PF-ASAR (WPS)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the PF-ASAR service

wps:Process.ows:Title: PHAVEOS WPS
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the PHAVEOS service

wps:Process.ows:Title: SBAS MTA
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: SBAS Multitemporal Analysis Service

wps:Process.ows:Title: TC-GPOD-2.4.8-WPS-01
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Test WPS template for validation of release 2.4.8

wps:Process.ows:Title: SRTM Digital Elevation Model
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: This application generates the STRM DEM in ROI_PAC or GAMMA ready format

wps:Process.ows:Title: ADORE DORIS interferometric processor
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: ADORE DORIS interferometric processor

wps:Process.ows:Title: Repeat Orbit Interferometry Package (ROI_PAC)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Data processing software allowing researchers in the area of topography and surface displacements studies to apply Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR) methods.

wps:Process.ows:Title: StaMPS Permanent Scatterer
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: StaMPS (Stanford Method for Persistent Scatterers) is a software package that implements an InSAR persistent scatterer (PS) method developed to work even in terrains devoid of man-made structures and/or undergoing non-steady deformation. This processing service is the StaMPS Permanent Scatterer (PS).

wps:Process.ows:Title: GMTSAR interferometric processor
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: GMTSAR is an open source (GNU General Public License) InSAR processing system. This service provides standard 2-pass processing of a master product against one or more slave products
